KermitRotation04Start: ^Kermit: Do you think Nathan likes me? Does he notice me?
^You: I would say I’ve seen you two sharing glances from time to time.
^You: Why don’t you talk to him?

c-0: ^You: You're so full of life I need to be more like you.
c-1: ^You: You're so full of joy I need to be more like you.
c-2: ^You: You're so full of love I need to be more like you.

KermitRotation04End: ^Kermit: I'm building up the courage to talk to him more.
